description: Meet the better-than-ever Men's Merino 250 Base Layer Crew. Smartwool updated this 100% Merino wool fan favorite with new colors and a new fit to improve functionality while enhancing aesthetics. Shoulder panels eliminate top shoulder seams, and a flatlock seam construction helps prevent chafing. Add one of their best base layers for cold weather to your winter wardrobe and experience the difference the next time you go skiing, hiking, climbing, or biking.
name: Smartwool Classic Thermal Merino 250 Base Layer Crew - Mens
